full_text:
The Suns have locked down homecourt advantage. On Friday, Phoenix finds out their first round opponent when the Pelicans play the Clippers.

Coverage of their run to the playoffs is presented by Canvas. https://t.co/v11cJ5CXxy

#MockMyWorld Annoying sports things

1 Unwritten rules-Carroll chewing-Steph mouthpiece-CBB refs

2 Too much analytics-Vague social posts-Coaches lying-Over charging

3 Load management-CBB/NBA differences-Pac12 times-Coverage of Lakers

4 Hot take shows-2min warning-Wave-Flopping
